pricing.title: Pricing Plans

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

1.title: What's included in the basic plan?
1.answer: The basic plan includes free diagnosis, software installation, device cleaning, and basic support.

2.title: How long does repair take?
2.answer: Most repairs are completed within 24-48 hours, depending on the complexity of the issue.

3.title: Do you offer warranty?
3.answer: Yes, we offer a 90-day warranty on all repairs and parts replacement.

4.title: Can I upgrade my plan later?
4.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. Contact us to discuss your options.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for all tech repair and maintenance services. We provide professional solutions for all your electronic devices.
